mysql.name: del_t_member_sign_now
mysql.sql: DELETE s.* from t_member_sign s where s.MEMBER_ID = '%(memberId)s' and s.CREATE_DATE = '%(nowdate)s';
mysql.desc: 删除今天用户的签到数据

mysql.name: del_t_point_logs_now
mysql.sql: DELETE s.* from t_point_logs s where s.MEMBER_ID = '%(memberId)s' and POINT_TYPE = 'sign' and DATE_FORMAT(s.CREATE_TIME,"%%Y-%%m-%%d")= '%(nowdate)s';
mysql.desc: 删除今天用户的签的日志记录数据

mysql.name: del_t_member_sign_last
mysql.sql: DELETE s.* from t_member_sign s where s.MEMBER_ID = '%(memberId)s' and s.CREATE_DATE = '%(lastdate)s';
mysql.desc: 删除昨天用户的签到数据

mysql.name: del_t_point_logs_last
mysql.sql: DELETE s.* from t_point_logs s where s.MEMBER_ID = '%(memberId)s' and POINT_TYPE = 'sign' and DATE_FORMAT(s.CREATE_TIME,"%%Y-%%m-%%d")= '%(lastdate)s';
mysql.desc: 删除昨天用户的签的历史数据

mysql.name: insert_t_member_sign_last
mysql.desc: 插入昨天用户的签到数据
